text.language: Nenio] n~a~poctoloc: auhiwis qen nieynoc: qen pieuaggelion: n~te I/#c# P,#c#.
Our fathers the apostles, preached to the nations, the Gospel, of Jesus Christ.
Bapa-bapa kami para rasul, memberitakan kepada bangsa-bangsa, Injil, Yesus Kristus.
آباؤنا الرسل بشروا فى الأمم بانجيل يسوع المسيح.
Apouq~rwou senaf: hijen p~kahi t/rf: ouoh noucaji auvoh: sa aur/jc n~]oikoumen/.
Their voices went forth, unto all the earth, and their words have reached, the ends of the world.

language.div: Suara mereka terdengar, ke sluruh muka bumi, dan perkataannya sampai, ke ujung dunia.

text.language: خرجت أصواتهم الى الأرض كلها وبلغ كلامهم الى أقطار المسكونة.
